name: Where Is The Beach?
description:
Story
All of your friends gone.You are alone this land.The beach entrance door want entrance requirements from you.
This requirements:
An apple
A banana
A cabbage
A jacket
A key

Atmosphere
In first map you are very close to north pole therefore you can see nice green sky.

Traces
There are some traces in game for found the requirement items.Traces will help you.
There is no fighting or shooting in "Where is the Beach"

Beach
You can walk this area and jump into sea.
+Sea wawes
+Yellow sand
+Bird singings
+Tropical fruits



Gameplay

W A S D for movement

E for Pick up

Space for Jump

Shift for Speed Run
